name: Monarch of Mars
description:
Monarch of Mars is a RTS game taking influences from popular titles like Star Craft, Sim City, Star Reach/Space Federation.

Contains an awesome music sound track made by Alex Luga

"You are not sure where you are or who you are... Suddenly you realize you are in space and a cyborg named FC-283 guides you how to establish a colony to Mars"

(The game contains some free assets from Unity Store. See credits in the game)
